room.name: Ballroom
room.short_description: The ballroom, the lobby of the hotel
room.long_description: The room is filled with renaissance paintings and a chandelier hangs above your head. The walls are painted light yellow.

room.name: Dining room
room.short_description: The dining room of the hotel
room.long_description: This dining room can host two hundred people. It is currently being prepared for dinner

room.name: Room C17
room.short_description: The room in the second floor in the section C
room.long_description: Room with two beds and an old-fashioned TV. There is a minibar filled with treats for guests.

room.name: Room A20
room.short_description: The room in the first floor in the section A
room.long_description: A spacious room with three beds and two wardrobes. It's cold and smells fresh

room.name: Kitchen
room.long_description: A kitchen filled with four cooks and two dozen waiters. It smells like chicken, garlic and a freshly cut onion.

room.name: Roof
room.long_description: A newly rebuilt roof, from which you can see tall buildings miles away.

room.name: Basement
room.long_description: A well lit basement of the hotel. There is a bowling alley, an indoor swimming pool and a DIY room.

item.name: Briefcase
item.itemLongDescription: An empty briefcase. It has a label with a french name on it

item.name: Wallet
item.itemLongDescription: A wallet containing 23 dollars and a ticket to a theater play

item.name: iPhone
item.itemLongDescription: A white iPhone 6s. It has few scratchmarks on its back

item.name: Pen
item.itemLongDescription: A black pen with carved initials I.J. on its side

item.name: Bullets
item.itemLongDescription: Three bullets located next to the Glock

item.name: Robe
item.itemLongDescription: A woman's robe. It's little wet and smells like the hotel shampoo

item.name: Vodka
item.itemLongDescription: A vodka bottle found in the minibar of room C17. It is half-empty

item.name: Text
item.itemLongDescription: A piece of paper with an encrypted text found in a vault

item.name: Ring
item.itemLongDescription: Ring with a diamond in the middle. It doesn't seem to have been worn

item.name: Screwdriver
item.itemLongDescription: A rusty screwdriver. It must be very old.

item.name: Book
item.itemLongDescription: A modern book written in some foreign Slavic language.
